comments.body:
```suggestion
  - "ansible-doc has new option to show keyword documentation. You can use ``ansible-doc --type keyword -l`` to list all keywords, and ``ansible-doc --type keyword environment`` to show details for the ``environment`` keyword (https://github.com/ansible/ansible/pull/72476)."
```

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +0,4 @@minor_changes:
  - ansible-doc has new option to show keyword documentation.
